title: Keen 6 Box?
content:
So really... how rare is this thing?

[img]http://img272.echo.cx/my.php?image=keen6box3ze.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img272.echo.cx/img272/4370/keen6box3ze.th.jpg[/img]

And tell me exactly how else you'd like it scanned, I'll be happy to do what' s needed.

I'll do the back as well if there's interest.

- RG

PS: first time here and haven't looked around for this as much as I should; anyone ever get a bug in CK1 where, on the pogo stick, Keen only goes left and not right? I built a P100 box for old DOS games and this problem appeared. Any solutions?

PPS: yay for the ezcode junk not working. copy & paste, then. *sigh*

Edit: Fixed your post. You need to have 'ezCodes' selected to get them work. --KR

title: Re: Keen 6 Box?
content:
Dunno how rare its, but cool either the way. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] Welcome to the forums as well, by the way.

As for the second question; never encountered that. If the keyboard functions well, and it's not its fault somehow strangely, then no idea. Never had that happening.You hear in your mind: GAAARRRRRGG!

title: Re: ...
content: hi and welcome to pckf nice to see a new member [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-oldy.gif[/img] [img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v177/memsys/goodorevilp.png[/img]

title: Re: Keen 6 Box?
content:
XkyRauh2001, I just couldn't resist doing that, haha. Still sort of giggling about it. =) The huge/bad text and garish compression... LOL. Okay probably only me thinking that's funny.

I'll do a proper scan (that was a quick job; needs more white background on the left there) and post it soon. Front and back.

I saw the thread at [url=http://p072.ezboard.com/fpubliccommanderkeenforumtheoriginalcommanderkeenga.showMessage?topicID=826.topic]p072.ezboard.com/fpublicc...=826.topic[/url] wanting the box scan claiming it's fairly rare; I had no idea.

Love the whole series though =) No good at it but it was certainly one of the best PC games of its day.

And as far as the joystick thing goes, yeah, it's REALLY odd. The joystick is definitely fine (works with other games), and it works with keen even, left/right just fine - get on the pogo stick though, and only left works. I'd try changing the soundcard (and thus gameport) but that doesn't explain it working fine 99% of the time. Too strange...

And last, thanks for fixing the post KeenRush, the code didn't want to work.

title: Re: Keen 6 Box?
content:
Welcome aboard.


As for how rare it is --pretty rare, actually.

It's hard as hell to get your hands on a diskette of Commander Keen 6, let alone get your hands on a perishable like a box.


(Not that I'd shell out a 100$ for a box, but still.)~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
I've changed a lot since my last time on this forum...
